participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and outgoing, Jordan enjoys sharing her passion for healthy living and fitness.
participant_1.background: I make sure my family is well-provided for, even though I'm not very tall. I'm an only child. My favorite band is the Beastie Boys. I am enrolled in several college credit courses. I can't resist a good salad from Aldi when I'm on the go.

participant_2.name: Alexandra
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Alexandra finds solace in nature and uses her experiences to inspire her writing.
participant_2.background: I'm looking for a quiet home with a view of the woods so that I can be close to nature and focus on my writing. I'd rather avoid conflict, but I'm ready to defend myself if I need to. I work as a trauma surgeon. My most prized possession is the journal I keep of my travels, which I have filled with sketches and notes from my adventures. I own a Chevy Tahoe.

content.text: Hi!
Hi there!
How's it going?
Good! Just got back from a run.
Awesome! I love running!
Me too! It's so relaxing.
I know right? It clears my head.
Me too! I love going on long runs in the woods.
That sounds amazing! I wish I could live in the woods.
I'm looking for a quiet home with a view of the woods so that I can be close to nature and focus on my writing.
That sounds like a dream! I'm an only child and I love being alone, so I think I would love that.
Me too! I'm a trauma surgeon, so I'm used to being around people all day, so I need my time to myself to relax and unwind.
I can imagine! That must be a lot of pressure.
It can be, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm sure it is!
My most prized possession is the journal I keep of my travels, which I have filled with sketches and notes from my adventures.
That sounds amazing! I wish I could travel more.
Me too! I love seeing new places and meeting new people.
I'm sure you've seen some amazing things.
I have! I've been all over the world.
That's awesome!
Thanks
